function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate use of information technology in solving and reducing organizational or business problems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures such as self-isolation and isolation of infected patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene measures and precautions during diagnosis and clinical care","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to follow who recommendations for avoiding close contact with infected individuals and animals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of the virus through respiratory droplets released via coughs and sneezes.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longevity of the virus on different surfaces, increasing the risk of indirect transmission through touch.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic spread of the virus before symptoms appear, leading to undetected transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus attacks the respiratory tract and infects humans, mammals, and birds, causing mild to severe symptoms.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 has fast spread globally, causing a public health emergency of international concern.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No standard vaccine or cure for covid-19.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge and uncertainties about the safety of air disinfection technologies","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensified threats and risks associated with pandemic resilience strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for improved ventilation-related interventions to protect against cross-infection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 and other pandemic related risks in indoor spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of thorough multidisciplinary investigations into environmental health for future designs","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance solely on ventilation systems for addressing indoor disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient information on sars-cov-2 and viral transmissibility","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex interconnected subsystems of engineering and construction controls","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient guidelines for indoor environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close collaboration between different specialists required for calibrating models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Novel approaches required to improve air quality monitoring","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality and pollutant levels","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of engineering controls may lead to increased spread of infection in the built environment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleanliness and disinfection of indoor environments may result in increased risk of infection transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of sars-cov-2 and future pandemics necessitates enhanced collaboration and advanced research in building ventilation.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on airborne virus transmissions in built environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of disinfection and purification techniques in building design","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on indoor air quality iaq in architectural design","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of air purifier filters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mechanical filtration for air purification","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling and simulation of disease dynamics in building design","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential impact of nanoparticles on human health and the environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mechanical ventilation and artificial environmental conditions","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dispersion of air pollutants around buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration leading to transmission of airborne viruses","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain impact of biofiltration technology on disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential emission of ozone from bipolar ionization technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Little attention to implementing technology in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient research on the efficiency of air purification systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of ventilation-related interventions","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and communication in implementing biofiltration technology in architectural design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsustainable or ineffective maintenance and control strategies for biofiltration technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or unverified safety results and solutions for biofiltration technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Far uv-c lamps can pose a risk to the cornea and skin","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on effectiveness of uv technologies against covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper placement of uvgi fixtures can put residents at risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with uvgi systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of thorough safety and economic environments","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ventilation in congested indoor spaces can lead to virus-containing particles reaching residents before filtration","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
